query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS backfill_checkpoints (
  id VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY,
  datasetId VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  indicatorCode VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  lastProcessedDate DATE NOT NULL,
  totalDays INT DEFAULT 0,
  processedDays INT DEFAULT 0,
  insertedRecords INT DEFAULT 0,
  skippedRecords INT DEFAULT 0,
  errorCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  status ENUM('running', 'paused', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'running',
  startedAt DATETIME NOT NULL,
  lastUpdatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL,
  errors JSON,
  INDEX idx_dataset (datasetId),
  INDEX idx_indicator (indicatorCode),
  INDEX idx_status (status)
);

  id VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY,
  datasetId VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  indicatorCode VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  lastProcessedDate DATE NOT NULL,
  totalDays INT DEFAULT 0,

  insertedRecords INT DEFAULT 0,
  skippedRecords INT DEFAULT 0,
  errorCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  status ENUM('running', 'paused', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'running',
  startedAt DATETIME NOT NULL,
  lastUpdatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL,
  errors JSON,
  INDEX idx_dataset (datasetId),
  INDEX idx_indicator (indicatorCode),
  INDEX idx_status (status)
);
